accessibility_text.message: Enable text information in addition to the color of the security level icon for any accessibility issues.

cache_clear_text.message: Click this button to delete the Extension's Local Cache.

cannot_fetch_from_ip.message: This extension does not handle IP addresses.

cannot_fetch_non_http.message: Cannot fetch from non HTTP url :

cannot_parse_tab_url.message: Could not parse the current tab URL.

extension_description.message: Website owner validation status and related score from the CCB.

improve_this_score.message: How can the website owner improve this score ?

link_report_malicious_content.message: You can report suspicious websites to: suspicious@safeonweb.be

main_error_reason.message: Make sure you are on a website and try again.

maintenance_text.message: We are actively working on the server and will get it back up as soon as possible. Please come back later.

no_host_info_description.message: This might be because it is an Intranet.

no_host_info_title.message: We could not fetch any domain information.

warning_description.message: The aim of the Safeonweb Browser Extension is only to provide information regarding the verification of the website’s organisation and / or its owner, not its content. Even with a high trust rating regarding its ownership, a website can always be hacked and contain malicious software. Be mindful of what you share and sign. Never sign a transaction (via itsme® or your card reader) at the request of someone posing as a "helpdesk" or a "bank employee".

why_zero_description.message: Even if some positive elements were found, the total score is set to 0 because this website has been reported as malicious.

why_zero_tite.message: Why does this website have this score?
